title: 999 Why You're Afraid of Success (and How to Overcome That Fear)
description:
“Don’t miss the moment because you’re thinking about everything that comes with it.”

We all want to be successful, but many of us are actually afraid of what comes with success. On today's 5-minute Friday, Lewis explains the psychology behind that fear, and then prescribes four steps to embrace our triumphs and enjoy big moments.

Mel Robbins: The “Secret” Mindset Habit to Building Confidence and Overcoming Scarcity: https://link.chtbl.com/970-pod

Dr. Joe Dispenza on Healing the Body and Transforming the Mind: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod

Master Your Mind and Defy the Odds with David Goggins: https://link.chtbl.com/715-pod
author: podcast@schoolofgreatness.com (Lewis Howes)
